group_1.narration: <Hanna's Side>

group_1.textLeft: I was aiming for her vitals, but I guess she@twisted outta the way...

group_1.narration: It's the end of the line…@I can barely stay on my feet.@It's just like what happened last time.@My fights are always a total trainwreck.
Nothing I can do about it, though.@I'm not exactly blessed with talent.@If anything, I'm a bit weaker than most girls.
I try to make up for it by tricking my foes with@illusions or turning them against each other,@but now…I'm at a dead end.

group_1.textRight: Are you really going to leave Sena behind?

group_1.textLeft: …We don't have much time.@We must settle things now.

group_1.textRight: Are you sure you're fine with me just observing?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. This is between her and me.

group_1.narration: Do I got anything else…?@I've used the crap out of my suggestion.@And I've done all I can with the terrain…@What else is there…?
Maybe something with light?@Snow can reflect light,@so I could use it to blind her…@But where exactly am I gonna get that light?!@Dammit, I can't think straight!
Far off into the distance, I see the sky dyed@with the colors of the setting sun.@I can't move my body anymore.@Not a bit.
Sorry, Sena… I couldn't protect you.@But you're already ahead of me, aren't you?@I don't think you could last long enough@to survive the transplant…
Although I don't remember you, I know that much.@What's wrong with these guys that they don't?
But you know something, Sena?@You're not alone. I'll be right with you…@So you can forgive me, right?@You won't be lonely soon.
How do you expect me to do that…?@No can do. If you're not gonna finish me off,@then just leave me alone.

group_1.textRight: I did not give myself to revenge so you could@deny me!
I have committed terrible deeds in pursuit@of my goal.
I will pay for my sins for the rest of my life…
And so I will say it again: Get up, Hanna Sarasa!
You spit on all the precious things that were@ruined, that I must atone for!

group_1.narration: ―Hanna―@What the hell are you talking about?
―Nanaka―@*Gasp*
I have no clue what this chick@is going on about, but it's obvious that@I'm not being the enemy she deserves.
…And we can't have that now, can we?
I'm the villain who dragged Kamihama into chaos!@If I don't pull myself together,@my reputation will be in shreds.
Now, I don't have any other tricks up my sleeve…@I don't got anything on me to turn the tide…@But I do have one thing that I forgot.
I've got the spirit of a villain.
―Hanna―@I'm the Chaotic Villain!@The one who brings misfortune down upon you!
Malice… I gotta gather more malice…@so I can move even if my body's broken.@That way I can fight even if my life's burned out!
I can't give up. I can't show any weakness.@I will stand as the incarnation of perfect evil,@sneering upon all without a trace of fear,@without a care in the world…
…so that those I've mired in misery can@strike me down without any doubts.@That's the spirit of a villain.@That's Hanna Sarasa!
―Hanna―@...AHAHA!
I have to protect Mikoto Sena.@Doesn't matter what evil she causes.@Nor what unforgivable sins she commits.@I alone will stand by Sena's side!
…I can do that, can't I?
Of course I can.
―Hanna―@That's why I became a villain in the first place!
―Nanaka―@...
―Nanaka―@...Your demeanor has changed.@It's just like back then.
―Hanna―@What're you acting so pompous about?
―Hanna―@Look at you, all prim and proper.@It makes me all the more eager to ruin you! Ahaha!
―Nanaka―@...I've never regretted not dealing you the final blow.
―Hanna―@What? Are you gonna wuss out this time too?
―Nanaka―@Indeed. You and Mikoto Sena will survive@so that you may atone for your sins.
―Nanaka―@But not before I get my satisfaction.@A single strike will suffice.
―Hanna―@How dewy-eyed… You do realize the only cure@for people like me is killing us, right?
―Hanna―@...Hey, Sena!
―Mikoto―@*Giggle* Not even death will cure us.
―Nanaka―@You…
Is it because Sena is here by my side?@My vision and awareness are clearing up.@Hell, even my memories are starting@to piece themselves back together.
A searing pain surges through me…@Memories are bursting out.@It's a strange, unusual discomfort,@like something's pouring down@my throat and into my guts.

group_1.textRight: It's good to finally see you again, Sena.

group_1.narration: What's…this?
Sena never told me about this conversation…
―Mikoto―@What's wrong, Hanna…?
―Hanna―@Nah, it's nothing.
…Did my brain blow itself out or something?@I keep imagining things that ain't really there…
Maybe…my memory of Sena is about@to become unsealed? Nah, can't be…@These memories and feelings about Sena@are coming from somewhere else entirely.
It's like Hanna Sarasa's heart is@begging me to remember who she is.
[flashEffect:flashRed1]―Hanna―@...Ggh.
My head hurts like hell…@What was I doing just now?@Nah…I remember now, yeah…@Still okay.
But I'm pretty sure@it's not gonna be okay real soon.@I don't even know what's going on…
Even so… It's fine.
I'd rather have a brilliant moment now@than a dull and rusty tomorrow.
I'm sure Sena feels just the same…@That's why I'm standing here,@bearing the pain of imminent death.
…I'm fully prepared now.
―Hanna―@Alright, once more, from the top…
―Hanna―@Tadaaaah! Drumroll, please!
―Nanaka―@...?!
―Hanna―@It's me, the one you've been looking for, Hanna Sarasa!
―Mikoto―@And her trusty sidekick, Mikoto Sena!
―Mikoto & Hanna―@Ahaha!
